thread.title: Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3

title: Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3
text:
> Top News Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3 Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw catches for fellow pitcher Brett Anderson during a workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's NLDS baseball game against the New York Mets at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens)
